/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++ -g -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/simple_server.dir/simplest_server.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simple_server.dir/DataStruct.cpp.o -o simple_server   -L/root/rdma-core-49.0/build/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/root/rdma-core-49.0/build/lib -lrdmacm -libverbs librdmacm_tools.a -lpthread
